name: art-deco
description: Opulence, mathematical precision, and architectural grandeur. Obsidian black with metallic gold, diagonal crosshatch texture, zero border-radius, Marcellus all-caps headings, rotated diamond icon containers, gold glows (never drop shadows), Roman numerals, and theatrical 500ms transitions. The Gatsby aesthetic.
author: getdrip
signature_traits: Gold glows: 0 0 Xpx rgba(212,175,55,Y) — never drop shadows
Diagonal crosshatch background texture — mandatory on all sections
Marcellus 400 + UPPERCASE + letter-spacing 0.2em on all headings
Josefin Sans 300 for all body text
Corner L-brackets on all cards (position: absolute, 2-sided border)
Gold divider lines flanking every section heading (gradient fade)
Roman numerals (I, II, III, IV) for steps and pricing tiers
Sunburst radial gradient in hero section
Thin gold gradient line at very top of navbar
Card border: rgba(212,175,55,0.2) at rest → #D4AF37 on hover
Expanding gold rule on feature card hover (20px → 40px)
Social proof and numbering in Roman numerals in Marcellus
Obsidian black #0A0A0A background (never charcoal or generic dark gray)
